wstop:Topic.wstop:MessagePattern: /idc:event[idc:type='RESERVATION_CREATE_RECEIVED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_CREATE_RETURNED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_CANCEL_RECEIVED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_CANCEL_RETURNED' or idc:type='PATH_SETUP_RECEIVED' or idc:type='PATH_SETUP_RETURNED' or idc:type='PATH_TEARDOWN_RECEIVED' or idc:type='PATH_TEARDOWN_RETURNED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_LIST_RECEIVED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_LIST_RETURNED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_QUERY_RECEIVED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_QUERY_RETURNED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_MODIFY_RECEIVED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_MODIFY_RETURNED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_CREATE_FORWARD_STARTED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_CREATE_FORWARD_COMPLETED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_CANCEL_FORWARD_STARTED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_CANCEL_FORWARD_COMPLETED' or idc:type='PATH_SETUP_FORWARD_STARTED' or idc:type='PATH_SETUP_FORWARD_COMPLETED' or idc:type='PATH_TEARDOWN_FORWARD_STARTED' or idc:type='PATH_TEARDOWN_FORWARD_COMPLETED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_LIST_FORWARD_STARTED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_LIST_FORWARD_COMPLETED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_QUERY_FORWARD_STARTED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_QUERY_FORWARD_COMPLETED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_MODIFY_FORWARD_STARTED' or idc:type='RESERVATION_MODIFY_FORWARD_COMPLETED']
